caveat.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a warning that something may not be completely true, effective etc
caveat.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She will be offered treatment, with the caveat that it may not work.
caveat.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a warning that you need to be careful about something, especially about a choice or decision that you are thinking of making
caveat.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The company gives a caveat at the end of the advertisement, listing the possible side effects of the drug.
